angular-page-loader

quick integration for your favourite loaders

Very simple to use and very effective!

This page is the basic usage, a normal AngularJs application without routes. With this module you can use your favourite loader in a second with a complete integration for your app.
In this other page instead you can see the example that uses the routing system.
The directive will show the loader during the routes view load only if the route takes more than 250ms to load.
This time is customizable with the latency attribute.
